title: Role of Data Validity Checks
text: Even if the report is due, it is very important to ensure that quality checks are implemented to make sure the data is usable.

title: Scope of the Report
text: Even if the report is used by only a small group of people, they still need to have high quality data to make business decisions.

title: Data Quality Score Cutoff
text: Though it is tempting to strive for a 100% data quality score, it is not practical. Usually there is a data quality score threshold set by the business to benchmark the score against that is lower than 100%.
